articles.author: Julia Horowitz
articles.title: Key inflation gauge in Europe hits record high even as overall price rises slow sharply - CNN
articles.description: Inflation in Europe has fallen to its slowest pace in more than a year, though stark signs of persistent underlying pressure on prices will complicate policymakers' next move on borrowing costs.
articles.content:
